explanation: based on the historical price data provided, googl (alphabet inc.) has shown a consistent upward trend in the last six months, moving from a price of 105.71 in april 2023 to 133.38 in november 2023. this indicates a strong recovery and positive momentum, which could suggest a continued increase in the stock price by the end of december 2023. in contrast, dis (the walt disney company) has shown volatility and a less consistent recovery pattern, with a price decrease from 99.66 in april 2023 to 90.37 in november 2023. spy (s&p 500) has also increased in price over the last six months but has shown some fluctuations and a less steep upward trend compared to googl, moving from 410.92 in april 2023 to 445.25 in november 2023. given the strong performance and upward trend of googl, it is likely to provide a better return by the end of december 2023 compared to dis and spy. therefore, the recommended action is to invest the $10,000 in googl.
